name: Elixir - Basic Setup
description: Minimal Sentry configuration for error tracking in an Elixir application
useCase: Getting started with Sentry error tracking in Elixir
seGuidance: Perfect for Elixir applications just getting started with Sentry. This configuration captures all errors with essential context. Add sentry dependency to mix.exs and configure in config/config.exs or config/runtime.exs.
configCode:
# config/config.exs or config/runtime.exs

config :sentry,
  # Your DSN from Sentry project settings
  dsn: "https://examplePublicKey@o0.ingest.sentry.io/0",
  
  # Identify the environment
  environment_name: :prod,
  
  # Enable source code context
  enable_source_code_context: true,
  
  # Root source code paths for context
  root_source_code_paths: [File.cwd!()]
